projects.name: TICKET BOOKING FOR AIRLINES
projects.description: Created a java application to book tickets. Processed user inputted information in the back-end of the application to return a subtotal price based on the tickets selected. Utilized layout editor to enable interactive scenes in the applications UI.

projects.name: HOSTEL ROOM MANAGEMENT
projects.description: created a portal where students can login. Students can book their respective rooms. Students can complaint if there any issues.

projects.name: RESEARCH INTRUSION DETECTION USING ML
projects.description: I have worked extensively on Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS) using machine learning techniques to automate security monitoring and enhance threat detection. This involved developing and implementing signature-based, specification-based, and behavior-based detection methods. My efforts in integrating these approaches have contributed to more proactive and robust defense mechanisms, significantly advancing overall system security.

experiences.description: Developed a chatbot website that offers guidance on managing finances based on varying income levels. Utilized Selenium to instantiate a Chrome browser for seamless interaction with specific elements on the webpage. Established a Linux virtual environment on Google Cloud to ensure daily execution of the program from the cloud infrastructure.

As a vulnerability assessment analyst, I identify vulnerabilities such as cross-site scripting (XSS) on systems. I prioritize risks, recommend fixes, ensure compliance, collaborate with teams for implementation, and educate stakeholders on security practices.
